---
title: "Annual_AB_Report"
output: html_document
---

```{r VariableSet, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
# Set your variables
ReportYear <- "2024" # Sets Year of Report
Database = "OysterLocalMD20250305"  # Set the local database to use
Server = "localhost\\LOCALSQL" # Set the local Server to use
```

```{r SetUp, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
# Performs basic set up for running all scripts
source("scripts/ReportSetup.R")
# Sets all needed functions
source("scripts/ReportFunctions.R")
# Set formatting for text and figures
source("scripts/ReportFormat.R")
# Load data
source("scripts/ReportLoadData.R")
# Apply basic filters to data
source("scripts/ReportBasicFilters.R")
```


### Text Format
```{css}
/* Sets the fonts for the RMarkdown output */
  p {
    font-size: 8pt;
  }

p2 {
  font-weight: bold;
}

  font-size: 18pt;
  font-weight: bold;
}

  font-size: 14pt;
  font-weight: bold;
}

h3 {
  font-size: 12pt;
  font-style: italic;
}

h4 {
  font-size: 10pt;
  text-indent: 5%;

}
```
